Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: witnessed what i thought was a sattelite object began deviating off course accelerating and slowing and eventually stopped completely object then accelerated out of sight at an extremely high rate of speed inconsistent with known aircraft or sattelite.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside having a smoke when I glanced up and thought I saw satellite. I observed the object change direction 4 times at different speeds and at one point stop completely it then reversed course and disappeared behind my apartment building approx 2 minutes later it came back on the same trajectory but at a slower speed. The object then stopped. It accelerated at a very high speed at what appeared to be an almost vertical climb but at a slight angle.
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
